          <title>
            <string language="en">Testing food colouring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfennahrungsmittelfarbton</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Coloration de test de nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coloração testando do alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Colouring difficile dell'alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξεταστικός χρωματισμός τροφίμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colorante de prueba del alimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is the first of four illustrations showing the steps to test the food colouring used in coating a brown Smartie. A few drops of water is placed on a Smartie.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brown smartie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brown dye</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chromatogram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chromatography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filter paper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food colouring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist das erste von vier Abbildungen, welche
die Jobsteps zeigen, um den Nahrungsmittelfarbton zu prüfen, der wenn
es ein braunes Smartie verwendet wird, beschichtet. Einige 
Tropfen des Wassers wird auf ein Smartie plaziert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est le premier de quatre illustrations montrant
les étapes pour tester la coloration de nourriture utilisée en 
enduisant un Smartie brun. Quelques gouttes d'eau est placées 
sur un Smartie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o primeiro de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram as etapas para testar a coloração do alimento usada em 
revestir um Smartie marrom. Algumas gotas da água são 
colocadas em um Smartie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è la prima di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano i punti per verificare il colouring dell'alimento usato nel 
ricoprire uno Smartie marrone. Alcune gocce di acqua è disposta
su uno Smartie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η πρώτη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν τα βήματα για να εξετάσει το χρωματισμό τροφίμων που 
χρησιμοποιείται στην επένδυση ενός καφετιού Smartie. 
Μερικές απελευθερώσεις του ύδατος τοποθετούνται σε ένα 
Smartie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el primer de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran los pasos de progresión para probar el colorante del 
alimento usado en la capa de un Smartie marrón. Algunas gotas 
del agua se ponen en un Smartie.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
